data.actual_result: All logs stay in same position. There is a blank space replacing the collapsed area. Trying to scroll will cause the screen to suddenly jump back to normal position.
data.short_description: Audit logs don't move back up when collapsing an expandable audit log entry at bottom of scroll.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to audit log. - Scroll to bottom of logs. - See if the bottom entry is expandable. - If yes, expand it. - Scroll down again to reach the new bottom. - Collapse it.
